title: how to learn javascript
content: JavaScript is typically inserted into HTML when used on the web, either directly in the file in an HTML tag, or linked to a separate file containing the script. JavaScript, as a full featured scripting language, can be used to provide functionality to a website. Examples include: Using AJAX in order to load content without refreshing the website. Changing HTML through the Document Object Model Changing CSS Validating inputs of forms and sending them. Tracking users as they move throughout the website.
author: John Doe
